meanings.definition: Engaged in a secret plot or conspiracy.
meanings.sent1: The caballed group met in a hidden room to plan their secret mission.
meanings.sent2: The detective suspected a caballed organization was behind the mysterious disappearances.
meanings.sent3: The caballed neighbors pretended to be friendly while secretly spying on each other.
meanings.sent4: The caballed alliance between the two rival gangs shocked the entire town.
meanings.sent5: The caballed meeting under the moonlight sent shivers down my spine.

meanings.definition: Formed a group to conspire or plot secretly.
meanings.sent1: The villains caballed in the shadows to overthrow the king.
meanings.sent2: The employees caballed against the unfair working conditions.
meanings.sent3: The students caballed to prank their strict teacher with a fake spider.
meanings.sent4: The politicians caballed to manipulate the upcoming election.
meanings.sent5: The birds caballed in the trees, planning their synchronized flight.
